content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting various components at positions (-5.5, 16.5) and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-5.4, 20.0) which is not yet connected to the electric network

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of necessary resources.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Make sure to connect the steam engine to the electricity network using small electric poles. Ensure there is an existing electricity group to connect to, or create one if necessary.

### IndexError: list index out of range
- When creating paths or accessing lists, ensure the list is not empty and that indices are within the valid range. Double-check the logic for generating paths to avoid accessing non-existent elements.
